body.name: Jeep Aries Stroller Wagon by Delta Children - Premium Wagon for 2 Kids with Convertible Seats, Adjustable Push/Pull Handles, Removable Canopy & Flat Fold - Greenguard Gold Certified, Black/Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 25 mins
features: CONVERTIBLE 2-SEATER STROLLER WAGON: This two-seater wagon features 5 seating options | Seats can face forward, backwards, inwards, outwards in different directions or be removed to carry gear | Outward facing seats with footrests ideal for older kids

TONS OF STORAGE: Zip off front and rear storage pockets, storage under the seats, kids snack tray, plus two parent cup holders | Removable canopy provides UV protection, roll down mesh screens and black out screens offer ventilation and privacy

EASY TO MANEUVER: Two adjustable leatherette handlebars for parents of all heights | Rust-resistant steel frame for long-lasting use | Shock absorbing puncture-proof 7-inch front wheels and 10-inch back wheels | One-step back brake for ultimate control

FOLDS FLAT: Flat fold for easy transport/storage | Size: 38.75"L x 24.25"W x 47"H | Folded: 25.6"L x 24.25"W x 41.14"H | Weighs 47.23 lbs. | For kids up to 42” tall; Holds up to 200 lbs. | JPMA and GREENGUARD Gold certified | 5-point safety harnesses

CAR SEAT COMPATIBILITY: Easily modify this wagon by adding your car seat and car seat adapter for flexible seating arrangements (both sold separately) | See the Product Description for complete list of compatible car seats
body.description: From park strolls to grocery store runs, the Jeep Aries 2-Seater Stroller Wagon by Delta Children makes any outing an adventure. Designed with today's families in mind, this versatile stroller wagon incorporates features to encourage autonomy, self-discovery, imaginative play, and sensory development. This convertible wagon offers a range of seating options to accommodate two children—both seats can face forward, both can face backwards, both can face inwards, both can face out in different directions, or you can remove the seats completely and use the wagon to carry all your gear. The built-in footrests make facing outwards comfortable for kids of all ages. The wagon’s removable canopy has roll down mesh screens for ventilation or black out privacy screens for on-the-go naps. Take advantage of the wagon’s expansive storage. The wagon features front and rear storage pockets, zippered storage compartments under the seats, kids snack tray, plus two parent cup holders. Two adjustable leatherette handlebars ensure a comfortable grip for parents of all heights, while the large, puncture-proof tires with suspension provide a smooth ride on any terrain. The wagon’s flat fold makes it easy to store and transport. It’s the perfect all-in-one solution for growing families.Easily modify this wagon by adding your car seat and car seat adapter for flexible seating arrangements (both sold separately):A1970 Adapter for Graco SnugRide (30,35,40), Evenflo Embrace, Evenflo Nurture, Chicco Keyfit 30, Britax B-Safe 35A1971 Adapter for Maxi-Cosi Mico 30, Cybex Cloud Q, Nuna PIPA lite rx, Nuna PIPA lite lx, Nuna PIPA lite r, Nuna PIPA lite, Nuna PIPAA1972 Adapter for UPPAbaby MESAA1973 Adapter for Clek LiingA1974 Adapter for Baby Trend EZ Flex-LocA1986 Adapter for Maxi-Cosi Mico 30, Mico 30 Infant, Mico Luxe, Coral 360

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Great for a zoo day with the family. It was easy to push and pull. Fits in the trunk even when not folded.! Easy to assemble. Great design and great for all terrain. Love that the wheels are sturdy. The tray is great for 2 kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than my double stroller!
reviews.reviewText: I am so happy and impressed with this wagon. It rides so smoothly and is easier to steer and push than my two seater stroller. It folds up super easy and surprisingly takes up less room in my trunk than my stroller. The Zip off front and rear storage pockets are enough space that I probably won’t be using my diaper bag but there is also plenty of room under the seats. The Removable Canopy takes second to instal/remove. I love that the seats are convertible and can be used many ways. The seats have to be removed in order to fold up the wagon but the clips easily slide on and off. The snack tray can also easily be installed/removed as well as the two parent cup holders. Very well made, sturdy and durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Wagon Stroller
reviews.reviewText: As a mom expecting her 4th child, if you are considering buying a wagon stroller, BUY the wagon stroller! This one is a great option. Quality built, easy to fold, fits nicely into my van, pushes smoothly, lots of storage. Comes with cup holders, snack tray, and a canopy. The seats are removable and can be turned in different directions. Everything you could want. It’s long enough that the kids have a nice amount of leg room but skinny enough that it easily fits through door ways. I just love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Jeep cart is our best recent acquisition. It's incredibly useful. It's used for walks with the kids and for grocery shopping. It has seats to accommodate two children and enough space to carry their purchases. It has a removable awning, front and rear storage pockets, snack tray and cup holder. It is comfortable, excellent quality of materials and super light to push. We really love that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST wagon!
reviews.reviewText: My girls absolutely love this wagon! It’s so easy to push and take out in our daily adventures. It super comfortable, I love the seats and seat belts, and the snack tray for their drinks and snacks. It is amazing quality and very easy to assemble. Would definitely recommend this !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spring we are ready for you
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am so in love with our jeep wagon. My daughters are 4 yo and 7 months and this is just perfect for us. They both fit comfortably and have plenty of space. I love that it comes with cup holders in the middle and on both sides so everybody can put their drink down. The wheels allow you to push the wagon through grass uphill and downhill relatively easy which is great for off path adventures at the park! Our kids love the roof attachment that has curtains to protect them from the cold when the weather doesn’t play nice!Overall, the quality is amazing and I Would definitely recommend purchasing this wagon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this wagon
reviews.reviewText: This wagon is super easy to assemble & folds nicely. I love the canopy and how the sides come down. It’s got lots of storage & I love how the seats can be placed multiple ways. Perfect for my twins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have now 5 stroller wagons and while this one has great potential the seats are absolutely terrible to get on and off. They are so difficult and I swear the clips will break soon with the amount of force needed to get them on and off. You also can not fold the wagon with the seats still in it so you will be taking them off and putting them on often. For almost the samePrice I would get the wonderfold W2
